title: 1,001 Accounting Practice Problems For Dummies (1-Year Online Subscription)
author: The Experts
text:
1,001 Accounting Practice Problems For Dummies (1-Year Online Subscription)
1. Auflage November 2023
Additional Downloadable Content
Wiley & Sons Ltd
Jetzt kaufen
Preis: 17,90 €
ca.-Preis
Preis inkl. MwSt, zzgl.
[Versand](/de/ueber-wiley/agb-widerrufsbelehrung#versandkosten)
Has accounting thrown you off balance?
Fear not, help is here. Your one-year, renewable, online subscription to 1,001 Accounting Practice Problems For Dummies gives you 1,001 opportunities to practice solving all the accounting problems that you'll encounter in your Accounting course. You start with some basics accounting functions like balance sheets, income statements, and budgets, move on to tracking costs, and manage accounts opening and close bookkeeping cycles, performance and profit, cost accounting and much more. Every practice problem includes not only an answer but a step-by-step explanation.
With on-the-go access you can study anywhere and any way you want--from your computer, smart phone or tablet. Working through and answering practice problems -categorized as easy, medium, or hard--you can track your progress, see where you need to study the most, and then create customized problem sets to get you where you need to be.
A one-year subscription includes:
* Access to 1,001 accounting problems online--from easy to hard
* A tool that tracks your progress, identifies where you need more help, and create customized problem sets
* A way to study what, where, and when you want
Whether you're currently enrolled in a high school or college accounting course, 1,001 Accounting Practice Problems For Dummies gives you the practice you need to increase your problems solving skills as well as your confidence.
